ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Venril
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I was in Karnor s last night when a group killed him. Well they claimed they did. Venril was on track, then one of them says he only had 6 gold on him,
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
>
>
> read this from someone in my guild:
>
> VS
> A source tells me that VS is a quest mob. He was not supposed to
> have a drop
> table. With that in mind as soon as some one finds another way to destroy
> him there probably won't be any loot and he will be enhanced once
> more after
> its discovered. The mob was not made to be destroyed, Sirran the Lunitic
> comes to mind.
>

I was in Karnor's last night when a group killed him. Well they claimed they
did. Venril was on track, then one of them says he only had 6 gold on him,
then Venril isn't on track anymore....

So its possible they determined how to do it again and if so what they said
adds credence to the quest mob thing.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 53 Minstrel of Scarab
Solusek Ro
